content: Don’t forget to join the virtual meetups of contributing.today for 2 interesting shows! today, 21 April 2021, about Site Reliability Engineering with a great panel of SREs and another one the next week about Chaos Engineering with @QuintessenceAnx from PagerDuty!

title: Upcoming SRE and Chaos Engineering sessions at contributing.today
